snippet.title: Bond producer praises cinema staff for stopping piracy
snippet.description:
Entertainment / 13 March 2013
… preventing illegal recordings of films including Skyfall, Ted, The Dark Knight Rises and The Hobbit. Attempts to record were reported to police…

snippet.title: Foul-mouthed bear Ted tops film chart
snippet.description:
Entertainment & Arts / 8 August 2012
Mark Wahlberg as the owner of the foul-mouthed bear, the film took £9.3 million, more than double its nearest rival, The Dark Knight Rises. The…

snippet.title: Batman returns in Dark Knight finale
snippet.description:
Entertainment & Arts / 20 July 2012
The wait is over for Batman fans as the much-anticipated final film in Christopher Nolan's trilogy, The Dark Knight Rises, is released this weekend.
